message: @ericflo I'm sure within a week James will have a Pinax template that will put you out of business ;-)
By 'this kind of website', are you referring to convore, or was there a link that got left out?
@bmelton just a SNS website looks like Convore. Pinax is cool, but I can't start

Pinax can certainly be used as the starting point for almost any Django site; but the devil is in the detail; there are a lot of technology choices that still need to be made (and challenges to be solved) and domain-specific code to be written
